name: Midnight Resistance
overview: You're the toughest soldier in the Resistance. That's why the Evil Head snatched your family. You're outnumbered, but not outsmarted. You and a three-barrel machine gun are gonna even the score! Bash into Evil Head's compound, battling tanks, missiles and flying robots in skull-to-skull combat. Crawl through bullet-filled corridors, stomp through flak-laden forests, swing down ladders and dive off ledges to ambush the evil army. The enemy hammers you with heavy artillery, rapid-fire lasers and slashing sawblades. You pound them with flamethrowers, nitro bombs and machine guns - your explosive-tipped bullets tear into their armor. The Head's forces are vicious and armed to the eye sockets. So what! Climb, leap and snarl through 7 levels of explosive action. Nothing can stop your rage!
